channel.title: Authors on Landfried
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Landfried

item.description: Know in such a way that you can put in univocal correspondence the phenomena perceived by your consciousness with some scheme of operation that is publicly intelligible and reproducible (Juan Samaja) Note to spanish-speaking readers: 1/6 del trabajo se dona a organizaciones comunitarias que lo demanden acompañamos a estudiantes en ciencias sociales que requieran formación As a Social Anthropologist, finishing a PhD in Computer Science, I consider the social sciences as an other empirical science, subject to the same commitment to understand, explain and predict for the general welfare.
